review:
It's just a T-shirt, so don't expect it to be warm. Quality is good, order a
size larger. That's it. I would definitely buy it again if I have to.

On time delivery simultaneously material is superb. Worth it. Perfect fitting
neither loose nor tight. For guys shirts using 40 size M size is perfect.

Excellent shirt. Actually some people think its a sweatshirt so they expect
its cloth to be a thick one, but its a normal wear shirt and has cloth like
our normal t - shirt , not so thin not so thick but medium.

i am a customer of this product and i recieved the product within 4 days of
placing the order. this shirt is perfect for style lovers. the fitting of the
shirt is absolutely perfect and its cloth quality as well as the stitching
quility are both awesome. it is difficult to find such a good shirt in such
price range. i would recomend this shirt to everybody.

Thank you Katso and Amazon. The product is very nice and cool!!! And also a
very good quality 😉😃

Delivery was little late than expected.  
But very Happy with the shirt.  
  
Thank you Amazon...

One of the best purchase I have ever made here on Amazon. Fitting is as
expected, delivery was prompt and overall a great Hoodie. Reminder guys this
is of fine cotton material and you could wear it almost in all seasons if you
like and in winters you'd probably need a jacket or something if you're from
one of the colder cities here in India.

Person wearing XL size should order M size. Very light to wear. Material is
excellent.
